subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: At a glance, Eddy Curry of the Knicks cuts an imposing figure: 6 feet 11 inches, 285 pounds, his bulging muscles outlined with tattoos. But the tattoos might as well be of bunnies and daisies.
snippet: At a glance, Eddy Curry of the Knicks cuts an imposing figure: 6 feet 11 inches, 285 pounds, his bulging muscles outlined with tattoos. But the tattoos might as well be of bunnies and daisies.
